Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/writing/1845838499786313728/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Give A Try To Undetectable AI Content"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/writing/1845838499786313728/)_"
---
[PROMPT] write a compelling [Keyword or Topic] article that is 2000 words long in markdown format with proper headings and an engaging outline. use simple english, contractions without directly mentioning them. vary the sentence structure and complexity to mimic human writing with high perplexity and burstiness. incorporate some longer, more complex sentences along with shorter ones. use vivid detail and strong verbs to create an immersive and entertaining article that is indistinguishable from human writing. [TARGETLANGUAGE]
